tweet_text:
@JacBuchanan_JB I start a lot of sentences with and and but for flow.  

I also like to omit the first several words in sentences and phrases for style points.   As in "She gets up from the bed and heads to the kitchen for a drink." becomes "Up to the kitchen,..."
text_en: I start a lot of sentences with and and but for flow. I also like to omit the first several words in sentences and phrases for style points. As in "She gets up from the bed and heads to the kitchen for a drink." becomes "Up to the kitchen,..."
